channel.title: Connecting from Webclient
channel.description:
Hi guys. So I was making a webclient on rs-ps after failing ric's tutorial, and the rs-ps works all great but theres one problem. I login, I get happy that I'm getting in the game, and I disconnect. But when I go from the client, it lets me come in, no problem. I really need the webclient to work, is there anything wrong with it? Because it's destroying my server's population that people have to download something to play on. I'll rep someone if they help me fix this problem.
All help is appreciated, thanks :)

item.title: Connecting from Webclient
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hi guys. So I was making a webclient on rs-ps after failing ric’s tutorial, and the rs-ps works all great but theres one problem.
I login, I get happy that I’m getting in the game, and I disconnect. But when I go from the client, it lets me come in, no problem. I really need the webclient to work, is there anything wrong with it? Because it’s destroying my server’s population that people have to download something to play on. I’ll rep someone if they help me fix this problem.

All help is appreciated, thanks
